text: Majestic Celestial Emperor, Lord of the Dome, whose radiance shines eternally, without beginning or end.
Majestic Celestial Emperor, Azure Lord, vast and boundless sky, soaring and gliding.
Majestic Celestial Emperor, Lord of the Vast, roaming the boundless sea, traveling to its limits.
Majestic Celestial Emperor, riding the wind and flames, whose arrival eclipses the sun and moon.
Majestic Celestial Emperor, illuminating the wilderness, both civil and martial, unrivaled and glorious.
The province's climate will no longer have a negative effect on the player.
Upon completion of the building, Chaos will simultaneously attack both the building's location and the Great Bastion.
Passive ability: All cavalry units gain "Strider".
The Emperor's will, like a candle's flame, dispels the darkness of evil!

The Great Bastion lies in ruins. Even if its structure can be repaired with the resources of Grand Cathay, its power to ward off evil has been lost.\\nTo restore peace to Cathay, we must venture into the Chaos Wastes, using the Celestial Towers as conduits to channel the Dragon Emperor's might and rebuild the Great Bastion.
